channel.title: Fraud on Butterfly Dream
channel.description: Recent content in Fraud on Butterfly Dream

item.title: Even the Pentagon can get away with fraud
item.description: Hahahahahahaha. Ok enough making fun of the situation (not really!). We can all point fingers, but the fact of the matter is, this is extremely sad. Quick quote: “The Army lost track of roughly $5.8 billion worth of supplies between 2003 and 2011.” Kind of reminds me of another army. You can follow the author or shout at him on Twitter
